intro: Psychotria vinkii, commonly known as the Vink's Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows as an understory plant in humid, shaded forest environments. Psychotria vinkii is also noted for its medicinal properties, though its use is less documented compared to other species in the genus.
